solution_line_template: In 1 minute, Ben picks {total_peas_L1}/{time_to_pick_L1}=<<{total_peas_L1}/{time_to_pick_L1}={peas_per_minute}>>{peas_per_minute} sugar snap peas.
Ben would take {target_peas}/{peas_per_minute}=<<{target_peas}/{peas_per_minute}={time_to_pick_target_peas}>>{time_to_pick_target_peas} minutes to pick {target_peas} sugar snap peas.
